author: ajeastt
description: Runs a Plutonium T6 (BO2 Zombies) server on Linux using Wine. Uses ajeastt/PluotoniumServerLinux with install_panel.sh and T6_zm_server.sh.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Plutonium T6 Zombies installer for panel (Pterodactyl / Calagopus)
set -euo pipefail

apt update -y
apt install -y curl wget git ca-certificates

cd /mnt/server

echo "[Installer] Cloning PluotoniumServerLinux..."
if [ ! -d "PluotoniumServerLinux" ]; then
  git clone https://github.com/ajeastt/PluotoniumServerLinux.git
fi

cd PluotoniumServerLinux
chmod +x install_panel.sh || true

echo "[Installer] Running install_panel.sh..."
bash install_panel.sh

echo "[Installer] Done. Upload your BO2 files into the T6Gamefiles directory if needed."

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: UDP port the Plutonium T6 Zombies server will listen on.

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Name shown in logs / console title for this Zombies server.

variables.name: Game Files Path
variables.description: Path to BO2/T6 game files. Leave default unless you know what you are doing.

variables.name: Server Config
variables.description: Dedicated config file executed on start (relative to game path).

variables.name: Game Mode
variables.description: Game mode passed to plutonium-bootstrapper (default t6zm).
